title: All Books, Videos and Works of Dr Zakir Naik have No Copyrights
transcript: my Mohammed Talha can I copy stuff from your book yes my book and all my books have got no copyright you can copy stuff from my book you can dip it in a lecture there's no problem you can reprint my book no problem only request is please do not change it don't edit it don't tamper with it as it is you can reprint it you can distribute it free if you want to make money and sell it I have got no problem all my books all my videos all my material it is copyright free you can copy you can utilize it you can even sell it I have got no problem at all but see to it that your own tamper with it
